content:
pvf文件下技能预读文件位置：
/etc/skillpreload.etc

文件解读：

[character] 这个表示每个角色的编码，具体可以在character/character.lst查询例如0代表角色“鬼剑士”
[skill][/skill]代表预读的角色的技能，具体可以在skill/目录下各种角色技能的list文件中查询，
例如46代表技能“上挑”；技能编码下的各种ani文件路径则是需要添加技能预读的文件路径

以男格斗中的柔道家角色为例：
发现男柔道的觉醒技能死亡旋律在释放的时候有卡顿的现象导致抓空，于是尝试用这个方法进行“死亡旋律”技能预读的添加，步骤如下：

  1. 先找到男格斗的角色编码为“7”：

  2. 到男格斗技能list文件中查询死亡旋律的技能代码为“63”：

  3. 到skillpreload文件中查询是否有添加该技能的预读（我用的pvf反正没有）

  4. 将技能相应的ani文件写入其中，具体的ani文件可以到character/atfighter/effect/animation/以及passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/中去通过技能名称方式找，如果不清楚可以找其他角色的预读写法参考

保存文件后替换服务端pvf再重新加载服务端即可上游戏发现该技能卡顿消失
具体写法我写在这里可以参考一下：

[skill]
63
`etc/UltimateSkillAni/atFighter_Grap.Ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoonattackkickup_front.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoonattackkickup_frontfront.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoonattackkickup_frontfrontfront.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoonattacklast_body.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoonattacklast_frontlv1.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoonattacklast_frontlv2.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoonattacklast_frontsub.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoonattacklast_sonicboom1.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoonattacklast_sonicboom2.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoongrab_back.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoongrab_backback.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoongrab_backbackback.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoongrab_front.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoongrab_frontfront.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoongrab_frontfrontfront.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoonjump_front.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoon_dust1.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoon_dust2.ani`
`character/fighter/effect/animation/attyphoon/typhoon_dust3.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonfog1.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonfog2.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonfog3.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoongroundexplosion.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoongroundexplosion_back.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoongroundexplosion_floorlv1.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoongroundexplosion_floorlv2.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoongroundexplosion_frontlv10.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoongroundexplosion_frontlv11.ani`

`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoongroundexplosion_frontlv1_3.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoongroundexplosion_frontlv2.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoongroundexplosion_frontlv3.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoongroundexplosion_frontlv4.ani`

`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonkickexplosion.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonkickexplosion_back.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonkickexplosion_backback.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonkickexplosion_front.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonkickexplosion_frontfront.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonstone1.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonstone2.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonstone3.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonstone4.ani`
`passiveobject/character/fighter/animation/attyphoon/attyphoonstone5.ani`
[/skill]

—————————————————@捞得不谈

适用于二觉技能的预读取，用于解决元素等二觉卡顿问题：——-@丨0丨-
技能预读.zip
